(https://www.bioenergyforum.eu/fileadmin/user_upload/White_Papers_19_06/Bioenergy-Innovate_Opportunities_for_the_Application_of_Microbial_BacVarB_Diversification.pdf)

(https://www.mdpi.com/1422-0067/18/7/1448)

3. “Bacteriorhodopsin-Based Materials: From Mediation to Applications” — a review article from the International Journal of Molecular Sciences 
(https://www.mdpi.com/1422-0067/18/6/1166)

4. “Exploring Bacteriorhodopsin for Biomedical and Industrial Applications” — an article from Earth and Environmental Science 
(https://ddr.nal.usda.gov/handle/10113/635400)

5. “Applications of Bacteriorhodopsin-Based Photosensitizers in Biomedical Sciences” — a review article from International Journal of Nanomedicine 
(https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6135636/)

(https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0924680720304040)
